ab_module.desc_all_attacks_bombs_used: All attacks and bombs have been used, congratulations to all.

bc_module.title: Clash Table
bc_module.description: Assignment of targets for the clash.
bc_module.step_1_desc: The 3 defense teams visible in the game, for each of the teams.
bc_module.step_2_desc: They are interpolated using linear regression and machine learning on a data_set of 147 of your recovered powers from the past 3 years.
bc_module.step_3_desc: Using the Kuhn Munkres combinatorial optimization algorithm to minimize the average power differences.

assign_clash_target.select_message: Select those who will be solo
